message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $10,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,500. Can we meet in the middle?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is quite high for me. Could you do $9,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,200. Can we meet in the middle again?
